Pie Recipe

‚≠êMedium
üîÑUpdated: 2025-08-15

Bake delicious pies in Grow a Garden with this detailed recipe guide Learn the perfect timing, ingredients, and techniques to create delicious pies that will earn you maximum rewards.

Pie Ingredients

Gather these ingredients to make the perfect pie in Grow a Garden.

üåæ

Flour

2 √ó Common

Found at: Market stall

üßà

Butter

2 √ó Uncommon

Found at: Dairy farm

üßÇ

Sugar

1 √ó Uncommon

Found at: Market stall

üçé

Apple

3 √ó Common

Found at: Orchard (Apple trees)

üå∞

Cinnamon

1 √ó Rare

Found at: Spice merchant (rotates daily)

üí° Ingredient Tips

  • ‚Ä¢Higher rarity ingredients will significantly increase your rewards
  • ‚Ä¢Fresh ingredients (harvested same day) give a 10% quality bonus
  • ‚Ä¢Prismatic ingredients can be found during special events or from rare drops
  • ‚Ä¢The 2025 update added seasonal fruit variations that change with in-game seasons

Step-by-Step Cooking Guide

Follow these precise steps to bake the perfect pie in Grow a Garden. Timing is crucial for the best results!

1

Mix Flour and Butter to create pie dough

0:00

Keep butter cold for a flakier crust

2

Roll out the dough and place in pie dish

1:15

Roll from the center outward for even thickness

3

Mix sliced Apples with Sugar and Cinnamon

2:45

Cut apples into even slices for consistent cooking

4

Add the Apple mixture to the pie crust

4:00

Arrange apples in a circular pattern for even distribution

5

Add the top crust and seal edges

5:30

Cut small vents in the top crust to allow steam to escape

6

Bake until golden brown and serve

7:15

The filling should be bubbling slightly when done

‚ö†Ô∏è

Important Timing Notes

The perfect cooking time for pies is exactly 7 minutes and 15 seconds. Overcooking or undercooking will significantly affect the quality and rewards. Use these visual cues to know your progress:

  • ‚Ä¢0:00-1:15: The dough should be smooth and pliable
  • ‚Ä¢1:15-2:45: The crust should be properly shaped in the pie dish
  • ‚Ä¢2:45-4:00: The apple mixture should be evenly distributed
  • ‚Ä¢4:00-5:30: The top crust should be sealed and vented
  • ‚Ä¢5:30-7:15: The pie will turn golden brown and the filling will bubble slightly

Rewards & Expert Tips

Learn about the rewards for perfect pies and advanced tips to maximize your benefits.

üèÜ Reward Tiers

Normal Quality

Sheckles (70-100)

Perfect Timing

Deluxe Sheckles (130-180) + Chance for Uncommon Seed

Prismatic Quality

Premium Sheckles (320-420) + Guaranteed Rare Item

üí° Expert Tips

  • The perfect preparation time is exactly 7 minutes and 15 seconds

  • Using higher rarity ingredients will significantly increase rewards

  • Pies are especially popular during Harvest Festival events

  • The 2025 update added seasonal fruit variations that change with in-game seasons

  • Pies make excellent gifts for the Kitsune character, increasing friendship points by 15%

Recipe Variations

Berry Pie

Special Ingredients:
Use Berries instead of Apples

Effect:
Grants "Berry Good" buff for 20 minutes, increasing movement speed by 10%

Pumpkin Pie

Special Ingredients:
Use Pumpkin instead of Apples

Effect:
Increases harvest yield by 15% for 30 minutes

Prismatic Pie

Special Ingredients:
Use all Prismatic-tier ingredients

Effect:
Highest possible rewards, has a chance to attract the Kitsune spirit

üåà Prismatic Pie

Legendary Difficulty

The Prismatic version of Pie is a culinary masterpiece sought after by expert bakers. This legendary dessert requires special ingredients and perfect timing, offering exceptional rewards and unique game benefits.

Prismatic Requirements

  • ‚Ä¢All ingredients must be Prismatic-tier quality
  • ‚Ä¢Perfect timing (exactly 7 minutes 15 seconds)
  • ‚Ä¢Must be cooked during Harvest Festival events
  • ‚Ä¢Requires the "Pastry Chef" badge (complete 30 perfect desserts)

Special Rewards

  • ‚Ä¢Premium Sheckles (320-420)
  • ‚Ä¢Guaranteed Rare Fruit Item
  • ‚Ä¢30% chance to attract the Kitsune spirit
  • ‚Ä¢"Pie Perfectionist" temporary title (24 hours)
